text: Mongol (), also known as Mongol: The Rise of Genghis Khan in the United States and Mongol: The Rise to Power of Genghis Khan in the United Kingdom, is a 2007 Kazakhstani Russian German Chinese Mongolian adventure movie directed by Sergei Bodrov and starring Tadanobu Asano, Sun Honglei, Chuluuny Khulan, Ba Sen, Amadu Mamadakov. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 2008. ==Other websites== * Category:2007 adventure movies Category:2000s biographical movies Category:Kazakhstani movies Category:Russian adventure movies Category:German adventure movies Category:Chinese movies Category:Mongolian movies Category:Movies directed by Sergei Bodrov
title: Mongol (movie)
